channel.title: Authors on Florian Siepe
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Florian Siepe

item.description: I am a software developer somewhere in the nowhere of North Hessia. My interests include software development in all kinds of forms. In particular the Java ecosystem, cloud-native business apps and modern web applications. My primary technologies include both the Java and the Javascript world. By using frameworks like Angular, Spring Boot and Quarkus I create scaleable containerised applications.
